TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SqlUserDefinedTypeAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class SqlUserDefinedTypeAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class SqlUserDefinedTypeAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 用于将程序集中的类型定义标记为 SQL Server 中的用户定义类型 (UDT)。

span.span: Used to mark a type definition in an assembly as a user-defined type (UDT) in SQL Server.

summary.span: 该特性的属性反映了向 SQL Server 注册该类型时所使用的实体特征。

span.span: The properties on the attribute reflect the physical characteristics used when the type is registered with SQL Server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SQL Server 创建一个绑定到具有的类型定义的用户定义类型自定义属性。SQL Server creates a user-defined type that is bound to the type definition that has the custom attribute. 每个 UDT 必须使用此特性进行批注。Every UDT must be annotated with this attribute. 请参阅[clr 用户定义类型](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=128028)有关 Udt 的详细信息，其中包括的 UDT 的示例。See [CLR User-Defined Types](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=128028) for more information about UDTs, including an example of a UDT. ## Examples 下面的示例演示`UserDefinedType`Point UDT 属性。The following example shows the `UserDefinedType` attribute of the Point UDT. UDT 是字节顺序，名为"点"，其名为"ValidatePoint"的验证方法并使用本机序列化格式。The UDT is byte-ordered, is named "Point", has a validation method named "ValidatePoint", and uses the native serialization format. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlUserDefinedTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlUserDefinedTypeAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlUserDefinedTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlUserDefinedTypeAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.Format format) cil managed

param.name: format
param.span: 值之一，表示类型的序列化格式。

span.span: One of the values representing the serialization format of the type.

summary.span: 用户定义类型 (UDT) 的一个必需特性，用于确认给定的类型属于 UDT 并指示 UDT 的存储格式。

span.span: A required attribute on a user-defined type (UDT), used to confirm that the given type is a UDT and to indicate the storage format of the UDT.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下面的示例指定`Format`的用户定义类型是`SerializedDataWithMetadata`和`MaxByteSize`为 8000 个字节。The following example specifies that the `Format` of the user-defined type is `SerializedDataWithMetadata` and the `MaxByteSize` is 8000 bytes. ## Examples [!code-csharp[VbRaddataSQLObjects#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRaddataSQLObjects/CS/Type1.cs#12)] [!code-vb[VbRaddataSQLObjects#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRaddataSQLObjects/VB/Type1.vb#12)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Format As Format
public: property Microsoft::SqlServer::Server::Format Format { Microsoft::SqlServer::Server::Format get(); };

summary.span: 序列化格式为 的值之一。

value.span: 一个 值，表示序列化格式。

span.span: A value representing the serialization format.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsByteOrdered { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsByteOrdered : bool with get, set

summary.span: 指示用户定义的类型是否根据字节进行排序。

span.span: Indicates whether the user-defined type is byte ordered.

value.span: 如果用户定义的类型是按字节进行排序的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user-defined type is byte ordered; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置为`true`，则属性实际上保证，可用于序列化的二进制数据的信息的语义排序。When set to `true`, the property in effect guarantees that the serialized binary data can be used for semantic ordering of the information. 因此，字节顺序的 UDT 对象的每个实例只能有一种序列化表示形式。Thus, each instance of a byte-ordered UDT object can only have one serialized representation. 时在 SQL Server 中对序列化字节执行比较运算，其结果应为相同的相同的比较操作好像在托管代码中执行的位置。When a comparison operation is performed in SQL Server on the serialized bytes, its results should be the same as if the same comparison operation had taken place in managed code. 支持以下功能时设置为`true`:The following features are supported when is set to `true`: - 此类型的列上创建索引的功能。The ability to create indexes on columns of this type. - 创建主键和外键以及 CHECK 和 UNIQUE 约束，此类型的列上的功能。The ability to create primary and foreign keys as well as CHECK and UNIQUE constraints on columns of this type. - 能够使用 TRANSACT-SQL ORDER BY、 GROUP BY 和 PARTITION BY 子句。The ability to use Transact-SQL ORDER BY, GROUP BY, and PARTITION BY clauses. 在这些情况下，该类型的二进制表示形式用于确定的顺序。In these cases, the binary representation of the type is used to determine the order. - 能够在 TRANSACT-SQL 语句中使用比较运算符。The ability to use comparison operators in Transact-SQL statements. - 可以保存此类型的计算的列。The ability to persist computed columns of this type. 请注意，同时`Native`并`UserDefined`序列化格式支持以下比较运算符时设置为`true`:Note that both the `Native` and `UserDefined` serialization formats support the following comparison operators when is set to `true`: - 等于 （=）Equal to (=) - 不等于 (!=)Not equal to (!=) - 大于 (>)Greater than (>) - 小于 (\<)Less than (\<) - 大于或等于 (>=)Greater than or equal to (>=) - 小于或等于 (<=)Less than or equal to (<=)

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsFixedLength { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsFixedLength : bool with get, set

summary.span: 指示此用户定义类型的所有实例是否都具有相同的长度。

span.span: Indicates whether all instances of this user-defined type are the same length.

value.span: 如果此类型的所有实例都具有相同的长度，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if all instances of this type are the same length; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置为`true`，为此公共语言运行时 (CLR) 类型相对应的 Udt 的所有实例必须都具有长度以字节为单位完全相等。If set to `true`, all instances of UDTs corresponding to this common language runtime (CLR) type must have a length in bytes exactly equal to . 此属性才适用于使用 Udt`UserDefined`序列化。This attribute is only relevant for UDTs with `UserDefined` serialization .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxByteSize { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxByteSize : int with get, set

summary.span: 实例的最大大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The maximum size of the instance, in bytes.

value.span: 一个 值，表示实例的最大大小。

span.span: An value representing the maximum size of the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须指定具有属性`UserDefined`序列化。You must specify the property with the `UserDefined` serialization . 连接到 SQL Server 2005 或更早时必须介于 1 和 8000 之间。When connecting to SQL Server 2005 or earlier, must be between 1 and 8000. 在连接到 SQL Server 2008 或更高版本时，设置之间 1 和 8000，其实例始终是 8,000 个字节的类型或更少。When connecting to SQL Server 2008 or later, set between 1 and 8000, for a type whose instances are always 8,000 bytes or less. 对于可以具有大于 8000 的实例的类型，指定为-1。For types that can have instances larger than 8000, specify -1. 有关与指定，用户定义序列化 UDT定义的用户是指其序列化的窗体中的 UDT 的总大小。For a UDT with user-defined serialization specified, refers to the total size of the UDT in its serialized form as defined by the user. 考虑这样一个 UDT 属性值为 10 个字符的字符串 ()。Consider a UDT with a property of a string of 10 characters (). 用户定义的类型使用序列化时，序列化字符串的总大小为 22 字节：每个 Unicode utf-16 字符占 2 个字节的字符，再加上 2 个控件的最大数目个字节的序列化二进制流所产生的开销的乘积。When the UDT is serialized using a , the total size of the serialized string is 22 bytes: 2 bytes per Unicode UTF-16 character, multiplied by the maximum number of characters, plus 2 control bytes of overhead incurred from serializing a binary stream. 因此，当确定的值，必须考虑序列化 UDT 的总大小： 以二进制格式序列化的数据加上因序列化所产生的开销大小。So, when determining the value of , the total size of the serialized UDT must be considered: the size of the data serialized in binary form plus the overhead incurred by serialization. 此属性不应与`Native`序列化。This property should not be used with `Native` serialization .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Name : string with get, set

summary.span: 用户定义类型的 SQL Server 名称。

span.span: The SQL Server name of the user-defined type.

value.span: 一个 值，表示用户定义类型的 SQL Server 名称。

span.span: A value representing the SQL Server name of the user-defined type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性内 SQL Server 未被使用，但使用由 Microsoft Visual Studio.NET 集成开发环境 (IDE)。The property is not used within SQL Server, but is used by the Microsoft Visual Studio .NET Integrated Development Environment (IDE).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ValidationMethodName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ValidationMethodName : string with get, set

summary.span: 方法的名称，该方法用于验证用户定义类型的实例。

span.span: The name of the method used to validate instances of the user-defined type.

value.span: 一个 ，表示用于验证用户定义类型的实例的方法名称。

span.span: A representing the name of the method used to validate instances of the user-defined type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从二进制值不受信任的反序列化 UDT 之后，此属性指定的方法验证 UDT 的实例。The method specified by this attribute validates instances of the UDT when the UDT has been deserialized from a binary value that is not trusted.
